name: BOYSEN®® Silver Finish Aluminum Paint B‑75

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Silver Finish Aluminum Paint B‑75 is a ready-mixed, long-wearing aluminum paint for general use on industrial and decorative works.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is ideal for exterior and interior metal surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Metal Surfaces
info.body: Wipe the surface with a rag soaked in paint thinner to remove grease, oil, wax and other foreign matter. For new galvanized surfaces, etch the surface by applying 10% BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71 (Dilute 1 part of B‑71 to 9 parts water). Rinse with water and dry immediately. Unpainted galvanized surfaces that have been exposed for 6 months or more need not be etched. Treat rusted steel by sanding and wire brushing. Use BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71 on remaining rust. Let it stay for 10-15 minutes. Be sure to remove all remaining residue. Immediately prime after drying.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® Red Oxide Metal Primer B‑310 or BOYSEN®® Rust-Off™ Primer Gray B‑330 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Silver Finish Aluminum Paint B‑75

info.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
info.body: Stir well to maintain mixture homogeneity.
